name: Art de Rêve

---

Art de Reve is a project of mine that I've been working on for quite some time (as of now, about a month). It is a Yume Nikki style game where you explore the deep dreams of a 19 year old girl named Guretsuki. 

Guretsuki is a fan of art. She loves to draw abstract art, though she wasn't always like this. She used to draw realism, however the reason why she switched her view on her style is unknown to most others, mainly because she refuses to leave her room. As well as painting, she also loves to sleep and explore her dream world.

Throughout the dream world are various effects that'll allow you to trigger certain events, or make exploring your dreams a lot easier. Be careful while exploring, however, for the deeper you go, the darker your dreams get...

---

This project features assets that may or may not make it to the final release. Any placeholder assets will definitely not, so expect those to change before version 1.0 is released in the future.

If you feel like sharing this project, please link this page to those you wish to share it to. Do NOT directly hand then the current available ZIP file, or past ZIP files, or a link which contains the download unless it is this page.

All of that considered, please enjoy, and have fun. (Please leave feedback and your own ideas in the comments! There's also a secret room with art by others if you wish to find it...)
